summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Dashboard with Invite Code system. All backend APIs (16 tests) and frontend integrations working correctly.
passed_tests: API health check - /api/ returns 200
POST /api/admin/invite-codes - Creates invite codes with all tiers (starter, standard, enterprise)
GET /api/admin/invite-codes - Lists all invite codes
DELETE /api/admin/invite-codes/{id} - Deletes invite codes
GET /api/admin/validate-invite-code?code=XXX - Validates valid codes
GET /api/admin/validate-invite-code - Returns 404 for invalid codes
GET /api/admin/validate-invite-code - Returns 400 for used codes
POST /api/auth/register-with-invite - Registers user with valid invite code
POST /api/auth/register-with-invite - Rejects invalid invite codes
POST /api/auth/register-with-invite - Rejects already used invite codes
Invite code marked as used after registration
Admin login works with admin@evidencemed.com
GET /api/institutional/trial-requests - Lists trial requests
POST /api/institutional/trial-request - Creates trial requests
Admin Dashboard renders at /admin for admin users
Non-admin users redirected to /auth when accessing /admin
Generate Invite Code form works with all fields
Active Invite Codes table displays correctly with status badges
Trial Requests section shows pending requests with Create Invite buttons
Auth page shows invite code field when registering
Invite code validation shows green checkmark for valid codes
Registration with invite code redirects to member-resources
seed_data_creation: Multiple test invite codes and users created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Dashboard with Invite Code system fully tested. Admin emails hardcoded: admin@evidencemed.com, test@evidencemed.com. All CRUD operations for invite codes working. Registration with invite code flow complete.
